name: Boid Project
description:
2D BOID SIMULATION
  • A W S D to move the camera
  • Scroll to Zoom in & out
  • R to reset the simulation

Version 1 . 0: Initial Uploads (October 24th, 2022)
Version 2 . 0: UI Implementations (November 13th, 2022)
Version 3.  0: UI Overhaul with Pre-determined Variation (January 9th, 2023)
